message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and worth the investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value this product holds. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $14,000. I'm willing to go up to $13,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I really think $12,000 is a more reasonable price for this product.
